content: 39sts or your previous end of round st count until ch1 space double_crochet in ch1 space double_crochet in next puff double_crochet ch1 puff ch2 puff ch1 double_crochet in corner ch2 space double_crochet in next puff double_crochet in next ch1 space double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from to until end join with slip_stitch to top of 3rd chain from beg of round slip_stitch until corner ch2 space - 45sts each side or multiple of 3 round 5-6 repeat round 3-4 or keep repeating rnds until you have reached your desired square size fasten_off cut yarn weave in ends each repeat of rnds 3 and 4 will have an increase of 6 stitches in each side of square ©copyright 2023 ana teixeira diagram crossed double_crochet section with puff please note this is sample diagram refer to written pattern for row instructions the red dot is the start of rounds slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet magic_ring mc chain stitch chain puff puff crossed double_crochet ©copyright 2023 ana teixeira test fit joining/closure turn square from wrong side using the mattress facing you and fold as shown in stitch join see picture above you can use stitch special stitches and markers if you need to help you techniques section you will see the right side is now sew from direction facing you test if your show by arrows book/device fits the sleeve before joining if it s still small add more rounds finishing always with a repeat of round 4 attached a button for closure your sleeve is now completed ©copyright 2023 ana teixeira testers projects name saliha maglietta name jai chanderkar ig @@old days ideas ig @amolihandmadedesigns name asia wicht name charmaine harvey ig @asiascrochetcreations ig @crochet_by_charmaine contact i d love to see all your projects so please tag me on social media for any questions/enquires instagram @jeijeicro analmteixeira@hotmail com use hashtags #puffeduppattern #puffedupsleeve #sleevepattern follow me and direct message on ig @jeijeicro support on ko-fi jeijeicro shop on ravelry jeijeicro ©copyright 2023 ana teixeira
